thread.title: Nokia relaunches iconic 3310 mobile model | GulfNews.com
thread.title_full: Nokia relaunches iconic 3310 mobile model | GulfNews.com

author: Balaram Menon
title: Nokia relaunches iconic 3310 mobile model | GulfNews.com
text:
Nokia relaunches iconic 3310 mobile model Published on 08:16 February 27, 2017 The much-awaited Nokia 3310 has been relaunched at Mobile World Congress (MWC) in Barcelona, featuring a colour screen at $52 
The much-awaited Nokia 3310 has been relaunched at Mobile World Congress (MWC) in Barcelona, featuring a colour screen at $52 image 1 of 9 + mgn Arto Nummela, Chief Executive Officer at HMD Global, shows the new re-launched Nokia 3310 phone, ahead of Monday's opening of the Mobile World Congress wireless show in Barcelona. Unlike the original, which was known for its sturdiness, the new Nokia 3310 will allow web browsing. Sitemap MY GULF NEWS
